hints.content: He is a young pirate.
He has a wooden sword given by Peter Pan.
He leads a crew of Never Land pirates.
He says 'Yo ho, let's go!'.
He fights Captain Hook.
His ship is named Bucky.
He has a parrot named Skully.
He becomes a Captain later in the series.
He has friends named Izzy and Cubby.
He collects gold doubloons.
He saves Never Land from darkness.
He wears a blue coat with gold trim.
He meets the real Peter Pan.
He has a special sword named Destiny.
He becomes the guardian of Never Land.
He fights Lord Fathom.
He has black hair and brown eyes.
He is brave and a good leader.
He helps Captain Hook sometimes.
He is a Disney Junior character.
He is a pink and purple striped cat.
He can disappear.
He has a very wide grin.
He says 'We're all mad here'.
He confuses Alice.
He can detach his head.
He leads Alice to the Mad Hatter.
He causes trouble for the Queen of Hearts.
He sings 'Twas Brillig'.
He is voiced by Sterling Holloway.
He stands on his head.
He appears in the Tulgey Wood.
He is mischievous and mysterious.
He asks 'Who are you?'.
He fades away leaving only his smile.
He is not afraid of the Queen.
He has glowing yellow eyes.
He is a guide, but a confusing one.
He mimics other characters.
He is a Wonderland resident.
He is a teacup.
His mother is Mrs. Potts.
He has a chip in his rim.
He sleeps in a cupboard.
He helps free Belle and Maurice.
He uses Maurice's invention to break down a door.
He asks 'Mama, are they gonna live happily ever after?'.
He turns back into a boy at the end.
He blows bubbles in his tea.
He is very curious.
He stows away in Belle's bag.
He is voiced by Bradley Pierce.
He has many brothers and sisters.
He is a servant in the Beast's castle.
He has a gold handle for a nose.
He doesn't understand what's happening between Belle and Beast.
He is small and fragile.
He is transformed by the Enchantress.
He calls Belle 'the girl'.
He is the youngest main character in the castle.
They are two chipmunks.
One has a red nose, the other black.
They often annoy Donald Duck.
They are Rescue Rangers.
One wears a fedora and jacket.
One wears a Hawaiian shirt.
They fight over acorns.
They live in a tree.
They have high-pitched voices.
They have a friend named Gadget.
They fight Fat Cat.
One has two teeth together, the other separated.
They first appeared in 1943.
They are brothers.
They appear in Kingdom Hearts.
They try to steal Pluto's bone.
They live in Mickey's Toontown.
They are named after a famous furniture maker.
They have a reboot movie on Disney+.
They are mischievous trouble-makers.
She loses a glass slipper.
She has a Fairy Godmother.
She rides in a pumpkin carriage.
She has two wicked stepsisters.
She talks to mice.
She must be home by midnight.
Her stepmother is Lady Tremaine.
She sings 'A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes'.
She wears a blue ballgown (originally silver).
She works as a scullery maid.
Her mice friends make her a pink dress.
She has tiny feet.
She is voiced by Ilene Woods.
She marries Prince Charming.
She has a dog named Bruno.
She is kind to everyone, even her enemies.
She loses her father at a young age.
She is the second Disney Princess.
She cleans the floor with bubbles.
She proves that the shoe fits.
He is a mantel clock.
He is the head of the household.
He is Lumiere's rival and friend.
He is very strict about rules.
He gives a tour of the castle.
He is afraid of the Beast's temper.
He has a pendulum inside him.
He is voiced by David Ogden Stiers.
He tries to stop the dinner for Belle.
He is transformed back into a human.
He gets buried in a pie during the battle.
He says 'If it's not Baroque, don't fix it'.
He winds himself up when nervous.
He has a mustache as a clock.
He tries to compose a romantic atmosphere.
He is pompous but loyal.
He saves Lumiere from LeFou.
He hates being late.
He argues about where to put the Beast's gift.
He is the majordomo.
She wants to make a coat out of puppies.
She has half black and half white hair.
She drives a long car.
She smokes a long cigarette holder.
She hires Jasper and Horace.
She is an old school friend of Anita.
She lives in Hell Hall.
She sings 'Cruella De Vil'.
She is obsessed with fur.
She chases the puppies in a snowy car chase.
She has a very bony figure.
She calls the puppies 'mongrels'.
She is one of the most iconic Disney villains.
She has a live-action movie about her origin.
She wears a massive white fur coat.
She gets covered in molasses and mud.
She hates anything that isn't fashionable.
She offers to buy the puppies.
She has a very loud, cackling laugh.
She is wealthy and spoiled.
She is Donald Duck's girlfriend.
She wears a large bow on her head.
She is Minnie Mouse's best friend.
She has white feathers.
She is often sassy and sophisticated.
She wears purple or pink usually.
She has three nieces named April, May, and June.
She first appeared in 'Mr. Duck Steps Out'.
She works as a reporter in some cartoons.
She is part of the Sensational Six.
She has a temper like Donald, but controls it better.
She runs a 'Bow-tique' with Minnie.
She loves fashion and shopping.
She is voiced by Tress MacNeille.
She has a ponytail made of feathers.
She is a member of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse.
She drives a purple car.
She is sometimes a damsel in distress.
She is very loyal to her friends.
She has blue eyes.
She is a toy doctor.
She has a magic stethoscope.
She brings toys to life.
She has a dragon friend named Stuffy.
She has a lamb friend named Lambie.
She sings 'Time for Your Checkup'.
She has a Big Book of Boo Boos.
She wants to be a doctor like her mom.
She has a younger brother named Donny.
She wears a white lab coat.
She fixes broken toys.
She has a snowman friend named Chilly.
She has a hippo nurse named Hallie.
She operates a clinic in her backyard playhouse.
She says 'The Doc is in'.
She is 6 or 7 years old.
She wears purple leggings.
She helps toys feel better.
She has sparkly headbands.
She is a Disney Junior character.
He has a very short temper.
He wears a sailor suit.
He has a unique, raspy voice.
He has three nephews: Huey, Dewey, and Louie.
He is Mickey Mouse's best friend.
He often says 'Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!'.
He is Uncle Scrooge's nephew.
He gets angry when things don't go his way.
He is a member of the Three Caballeros.
He has a girlfriend named Daisy.
He serves in the Navy in some cartoons.
He is the Royal Magician in Kingdom Hearts.
He wears a blue hat.
He is often the victim of chipmunk pranks.
He has a lucky number 313 (his license plate).
He is very boastful.
He gets red in the face when mad.
He tries to be a good uncle.
He has appeared in more films than any other Disney character.
He says 'What's the big idea?'.
